body_html:
Ah, that's because TensorFlow doesn't seem to build with Xcode 7.3 anymore, but it still works fine with Xcode 8.3. For reference, here is my collection of patches and workarounds to build for Mac with CUDA that work with TensorFlow 1.9.0-rc0:
https://github.com/bytedeco/javacpp-presets/blob/master/tensorflow/cppbuild.sh#L131

body:
Ah, that's because TensorFlow doesn't seem to build with Xcode 7.3 anymore, but it still works fine with Xcode 8.3. For reference, here is my collection of patches and workarounds to build for Mac with CUDA that work with TensorFlow 1.9.0-rc0:
https://github.com/bytedeco/javacpp-presets/blob/master/tensorflow/cppbuild.sh#L131
